mapper.sql: mp_id, m_id, truename, telephone, company, position, registertime, email, remark, is_del
mapper.select: SELECT FROM meeting_people WHERE is_del = '0' limit #{offset}, #{limit}

mapper.update:
update meeting_people
m_id = #{mId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
truename = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mp_id = #{mpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
